mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.wupin_name as wupinName ,a.wupin_photo as wupinPhoto ,a.youxi_types as youxiTypes ,a.wupin_types as wupinTypes ,a.shuliang_number as shuliangNumber ,a.wupin_content as wupinContent ,a.huoqu_text as huoquText ,a.peiyang_text as peiyangText ,a.shiyong_text as shiyongText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM wupin a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.wupin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinName},'%')
and a.youxi_types = #{params.youxiTypes}
and a.wupin_types = #{params.wupinTypes}
and a.shuliang_number >= #{params.shuliangNumberStart}
and a.shuliang_number <= #{params.shuliangNumberEnd}
and a.shuliang_number = #{params.shuliangNumber}
and a.wupin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinContent},'%')
and a.huoqu_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.huoquText},'%')
and a.peiyang_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.peiyangText},'%')
and a.shiyong_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiyongText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
